(/api/intent/handle) Refresh Dark Theme Light Theme System Theme Deutsch English Automatic Silence Detection Background WakeWord Detection Enable Background Services Wake Up Display WakeWord Indication Sound Visual Enable SSL Enabled Sound and Light Choose Certificate Show Log Log Audio Frames Logging HTTP SSL AccessKey open PicoVoice Console (to generate AccessKey) Expand list item Expand drop down Visibility Alexa Americano Blueberry Bumblebee Computer Grapefruit Grasshopper Hey Google Hey Siri Jarvis Ok Google Picovoice Porcupine Terminator Log Settings Verbose Debug Info Warn Error Assert Microphone Microphone access To record audio microphone access is required. To use Porcupine WakeWord service microphone access is required. To check audio level microphone access is required. open settings to allow microphone access Settings Cancel Ok Audio Level Test Stop Audio Level Threshold Silence Detection Time (ms) Overlay Permission Overlay Visual indication uses an Overlay to display the indication.
Click "OK", scroll to Rhasspy and allow Permission.
Save Save settings to an external file. Restore settings from an external file. Share Reset Device This settings can be changed with MQTT commands. Volume HotWord (WakeWord) Audio Output Intent Handling Microphone Overlay Show Microphone Overlay Best to use with Background Services, else the Overlay may closes when App is hidden Visible while app is opened Restore Save and Restore Settings Save Settings The exported Settings file contains sensitive Data!
Read the file and edit carefully before sharing. Restore Settings Your current settings will be lost after restoring from file! Warning About Rhasspy Mobile Version Sounds WAV files to play when Rhasspy wakes up and is finished recording a voice command.
